channel.title: [pi] selling items for what you payed [pi]
channel.description: hey guys, i currently have a donator store & pking point store which you buy with donator/pk points for the items how would i make it so you can sell those items back for the points? right now it gives you money for selling them back. thankyou

hey guys,
i currently have a donator store & pking point store which you buy with donator/pk points for the items
how would i make it so you can sell those items back for the points? right now it gives you money for selling them back.
thankyou
